output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this isn't decisive.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions two presidential candidates: - Călin Georgescu (Position 11) - George Simion (Position 2)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement - Running on both Facebook and Instagram - High impression count (250,000-299,999) - Large estimated audience (>1,000,001)
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The statement "viitorului președinte, George Simion" is a clear prediction/assumption of electoral victory - It implies endorsement from one candidate (Georgescu) to another (Simion) - The timing (November 22, during election period) is significant
5. Journalism: No - This isn't presented as news reporting - It's a direct statement promoting electoral outcomes - Lacks journalistic balance or objectivity
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a paid, widely distributed message - It's structured as an electoral announcement

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It directly promotes George Simion as "viitorul președinte" - Shows alignment between two presidential candidates - Uses paid distribution to reach a wide audience - Timing coincides with election period - Clear electoral messaging and intention to influence voters
conclusion.message-for-police: AgentiadeInformatii.ro, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, referitor la candidatul George Simion. Postarea cu ID 3865348743725271 il prezinta pe George Simion ca "viitorul președinte" si promoveaza o alianța electorala intre doi candidați, cu scopul clar de a influenta alegatorii. Mesajul a fost distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact semnificativ (peste 250.000 de afisari), dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, reprezentand astfel o forma clara de propaganda electorala in afara perioadei permise de lege.
